poll_info.title: NuggMD Cannabis Consumer Poll - Q2 2025 Omnibus
poll_info.methodology: Digital questionnaire sent to opt-in list of verified cannabis consumers via NuggMD.com first-party data

questions.question_text: Would you pay a premium for cannabis that's cultivated, distributed, and sold by small, independent businesses as opposed to large, multi-state cannabis companies?
How effective is cannabis, when used in your spare time, in helping you deal with work-related stress or anxiety?
REDACTED - This question is reserved for internal use.
Where do you prefer to consume cannabis?
If you could vape in more public places, would you vape cannabis more often?
How interested are you in cannabis products that add other cannabinoids, such as CBG, CBN, or CBD, to THC for therapeutic or wellness reasons?
REDACTED - This question is reserved for internal use.
REDACTED - This question is reserved for internal use.
REDACTED - This question is reserved for internal use.

demographics.population: Representative sample of cannabis consumers in state-legal markets
demographics.sample_method: Sourced from independent providers of verified consumer data and first-party data
demographics.verification: Regular cannabis users. A strong majority of the sample reports daily or weekly cannabis use.
